plot: A stage director and his female assistant find the blackest protagonist possible, then make him up as white as possible, to create the titular character.
title: Catastrophe
plot_es: A stage director and his female assistant find the blackest protagonist possible, then make him up as white as possible, to create the titular character.
plot_en: A stage director and his female assistant find the blackest protagonist possible, then make him up as white as possible, to create the titular character.
